title: Passive solar design - energy absorbing materials

content.question: Buildings designed to partially heat rooms by passive solar heating rely on

choices.label: solar cells to generate electricity to power a heater in the room
solar collectors to warm water that is pumped into the room
warm water pumped from underground to warm the room
materials that absorb and store solar energy to warm the room

content.answer: materials that absorb and store solar energy to warm the room

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
